Sentencas: Direct carbon fuel cells offer the opportunity of generating energy from coal at high efficiency as an alternative to the procedure of conventional power plants.
Titulo: Comparative study of durability of hybrid direct carbon fuel cells with anthracite coal and bituminous coal

Sentencas: In this study, raw anthracite coal and raw bituminous coal were investigated in a hybrid direct carbon fuel cell (HDCFC), which was a combination of a solid oxide fuel cell and a molten carbonate fuel cell.
Titulo: Comparative study of durability of hybrid direct carbon fuel cells with anthracite coal and bituminous coal

Sentencas: Mechanical mixing was confirmed to be an efficient method of mixing coal with carbonate.
Titulo: Comparative study of durability of hybrid direct carbon fuel cells with anthracite coal and bituminous coal

Sentencas: The coal samples had different properties, for example, carbon content, hydrogen content, volatile matter and impurities.
Titulo: Comparative study of durability of hybrid direct carbon fuel cells with anthracite coal and bituminous coal

Sentencas: The results showed that the maximum power density obtained by the cell with anthracite coal was similar to that obtained by the cell with bituminous coal.
Titulo: Comparative study of durability of hybrid direct carbon fuel cells with anthracite coal and bituminous coal

Sentencas: It was found that the total power output from coal in HDCFCs mostly depended on the carbon content, while volatile matter, hydrogen content, moisture, etc. had an effect on the short-term durability.
Titulo: Comparative study of durability of hybrid direct carbon fuel cells with anthracite coal and bituminous coal

Sentencas: HDCFCs were kept operating for more than 120 h with 1.6 g coal.
Titulo: Comparative study of durability of hybrid direct carbon fuel cells with anthracite coal and bituminous coal

Sentencas: This study demonstrates that energy can be generated efficiently by employing anthracite and bituminous coal in hybrid direct carbon fuel cells.
Titulo: Comparative study of durability of hybrid direct carbon fuel cells with anthracite coal and bituminous coal
